name: Demonforged Mech Suit
Traits:
Exo Skeleton. A sentient creature inhabits and controls the Mech Suit from within. Oncesubstantial damage is dealt to the mech suit, the creature within may be exposed.

Demon Forged This mech suit was forged by a demon of hell at a demon forge providing itresistance to fire damage. It also imbues the create inhabiting the suit with hatred, forcing their alignment to bechaotic evil.
Actions:
Multiattack. The Mech Suit makes two attacks with its Serrator Claws.

Serrator Claws. +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 slashing damage and 1d8 piercing damage.

Astral Cannon. +7 to hit, range 60/360 ft., one target. Hit: 2d8 force damage.
